page.title: 06A WEEK-END AT TYWARDREATH
page.content: On Saturdays I get up around 9 o'clock. Sometimes I go back to sleep. When I get up I watch the television. When Mum comes down I have my breakfast. I have Kellogg's Frosties. My friend sometimes calls for me and we play football. When Dad sees me on Saturday we play football or go swimming but sometimes we go and watch a video on his video recorder. When I see him for a whole day I have my dinner there. He takes me home at 5 o'clock, sometimes at half past five but that is only when Mum is going somewhere. When I get home Mum is usually cleaning or up in her bedroom. I go to bed at 11 o'clock.
